alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 4:01PM CST until February 26 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Western Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 445 PM CST/345 PM MST/. * At 400 PM CST/300 PM MST/, a severe thunderstorm was located very near The Saunders Elevator, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Manter around 410 PM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
